title: Land for sale in pannipitiya
details:
Land for sale in highly residential area in panniptiya. Either full lot (16.20P) or two 8.10P lots.
300m to Pannipitya junction
2km to Maharagama town
4km Kottawa highway entrance
7km to Battaramulla town

5 minutes walk to highlevel road, Kottawa-borella road bus stops, and Pannipitiya Railway station
1km to Pannipitya Dharmapala Vidyalaya & Louvre College
850m to Pannipitiya nursing home
700m to Keells & Cargills Super Markets

Clear deeds single owner for over 50 years.

There is a 3 bedroom antique house in the land in ok living conditions. Will be demolished before the sale if the buyer doesn't want it.

1 million per perch (Slightly negotiable) - No brokers please.
